commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: The flag game's brought a smile back to your faces. It's all right now!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Don't get complacent yet! Kids' moods change easily, so it's on to the next game!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Nico, you're so knowledgeable.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: This is what happens when you play with little kids every day. Leave any kind of kid stuff to me!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: All right, you two, what should we play next?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: You'd like to play house?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Oh wow, it's been years since I played that.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Okay! Let's use this super nice play set for it!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: This is a full-scale set, so playing house with it is super worth it!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Who's going to do what? Who do you want to be? ...Mm-hmm, I see. Big sis is gonna be Mom, while little sis is gonna be Dad. Who should we be?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: The neighbors? Or your friends?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: What? Y-You want me to be your kid?

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Ahahaha! That's hilarious! Let's all play the kids!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Huh? What? I'm the family dog?!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: I'm the cat?!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Mom, is the food not ready yet?

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Woof woof!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: What? I have to clean up my toys before I can eat? You're right, it's not good to have a mess.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Om, nom. It's yummy, Mom.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Hmm? If I eat too slow, the bus will come? I-I got it. I'll eat fast.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Kitty, doggy, here's your food.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Woof woof!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Meoooow!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Dad, what are you doing?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: What? Reading the newspaper on the toilet?!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: What?! We're bringing Dad over from the toilet? I have to eat fast or things won't get cleaned up?!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Was playing house always like this?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: This is next level.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Woof, woof, woof!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Meooow!
